page.title: 12RECREATION (2)
page.content:
{ CLUBS,SOCIAL LIFE AND OUR GALA WEEK
There is a Youth club held in the Seaboard Hall every Wednesday and there are several other things like Whist Drives and occasionally a Beetle Drive. There is usually a Gala Week every year but there isn't one this year.The Gala consists of six days of discos, water sports,treasure hunts and sports days.On the main day (Saturday) there are Highland Dancing stands,hot dog stands,water sports like greasy pole fights and diving for plate competitions and ordinary diving competitions. In the summer June-August the children go down to the beach and swim.The sea is quite cold but you can get used to it.On stormy summer days
